mapper.select: select e.estmt_code, c.client_name "client_code", e.estmt_date, e.de_date, e.all_sum, e.estmt_st from estimate e, client c where e.client_code = c.client_code order by estmt_code desc

select d.estmt_dno "estmtDno", d.pro_code "proCode", p.pro_name "proName", d.sell_num "sellNum", o.sell_price "sellPrice", d.sum_price "sumPrice"
from estimate e, estimate_D d, product p, product_option o
where e.estmt_code = d.estmt_code and d.pro_code = p.pro_code and p.pro_code = o.pro_code and e.estmt_code = #{estmtCode}
order by estmt_dno
select p.pro_code, p.pro_name, o.sell_price from product p, product_option o where p.pro_code =o.pro_code and p.pro_group like 'CP%'
select client_name, client_code from client where client_code like 'EEC%' order by client_code
select concat('est' , concat (to_char(sysdate,'YYmmdd'), concat ('-', nvl(max(to_number(substr(estmt_code, 11))),0)+1 ) )) "estmtCode" from estimate
mapper.insert: insert into estimate (estmt_code, client_code, estmt_date, de_date, estmt_st, all_sum) values( #{estmtCode}, #{clientCode} , sysdate, current_date, '대기',#{allSum} )

select nvl(max(to_number(estmt_dno)),0)+1 from estimate_d
insert into estimate_d (estmt_dno, estmt_code, pro_code, sell_num, sum_price) values ( #{estmtDno}, #{estmtCode}, #{proCode}, #{sellNum}, #{sumPrice} )
mapper.select: select f.sys_code, f.sys_name, f.sys_date, f.sys_ks, f.sys_model, f.sys_money, f.sys_status, f.test_cycle, e.emp_name from facilities f, employees e where f.emp_num = e.emp_num order by sys_code
mapper.insert:
select concat('sys' , concat (to_char(sysdate,'YYmmdd'), concat ('-', nvl(max(to_number(substr(sys_code, 11))),0)+1 ) )) "sysCode" from facilities
insert into facilities ( sys_code, sys_name, sys_date, sys_ks, sys_model, sys_money, sys_status, test_cycle, emp_num ) values (#{sysCode}, #{sysName}, current_date, #{sysKs}, #{sysModel}, #{sysMoney}, '미사용' , #{testCycle}, #{empNum} )
